sourcesContent:
/*! ========================================================= * Argon Design System React - v1.1.1 ========================================================= * Product Page: https://www.creative-tim.com/product/argon-design-system-react * Copyright 2022 Creative Tim (https://www.creative-tim.com) * Licensed under MIT (https://github.com/creativetimofficial/argon-design-system-react/blob/master/LICENSE.md) * Coded by Creative Tim ========================================================= * The above copyright notice and this permission notice shall be included in all copies or substantial portions of the Software. */ import React from "react"; // nodejs library that concatenates classes import classnames from "classnames"; // reactstrap components import { Button, Card, CardHeader, CardBody, FormGroup, Form, Input, InputGroupAddon, InputGroupText, InputGroup, Modal, Row, Col } from "reactstrap"; class Modals extends React.Component { state = {}; toggleModal = (state) => { this.setState({ [state]: !this.state[state] }); }; render() { return ( <>

Javascript Components

Modals

this.toggleModal("defaultModal")} >
Type your modal title

Far far away, behind the word mountains, far from the countries Vokalia and Consonantia, there live the blind texts. Separated they live in Bookmarksgrove right at the coast of the Semantics, a large language ocean.

A small river named Duden flows by their place and supplies it with the necessary regelialia. It is a paradisematic country, in which roasted parts of sentences fly into your mouth.

this.toggleModal("notificationModal")} >
Your attention is required

Subscribe to our patreon!

Viewers, subscribers, patrons like you are the reason more immigrants breathe easier. Check it out.

this.toggleModal("formModal")} >
Sign in with
Or sign in with credentials
this.setState({ emailFocused: true }) } onBlur={(e) => this.setState({ emailFocused: false }) } /> this.setState({ passwordFocused: true }) } onBlur={(e) => this.setState({ passwordFocused: false }) } />
); } } export default Modals;
